parameter.name: Page Name
parameter.help: The name of the created page

parameter.name: DI Activity Name
parameter.help: The name of the activity class to create

parameter.name: Layout Name
parameter.help: The name of the layout to create for the activity

parameter.name: DIActivityTitle
parameter.help: The name of the activity. For launcher activities, the application title.

parameter.name: Menu Resource Name
parameter.help: The name of the resource file to create for the menu items

parameter.name: Launcher Activity
parameter.help: If true, this activity will have a CATEGORY_LAUNCHER intent filter, making it visible in the launcher

parameter.name: Toolbar in layout
parameter.help: If true, the layout file will contains a toolbar and appbar layout

parameter.name: Home as up
parameter.help: If true, the page will have a back button

parameter.name: Contain SwipRefreshLayout
parameter.help: If true, the layout will include a SwipeRefreshLayout layout

parameter.name: With list page state
parameter.help: If true, the list will show page state like loading, error, empty

parameter.name: With load more
parameter.help: If true, the list will be endless

parameter.name: Content Layout Name
parameter.help: The name of the App Bar layout to create for the activity

parameter.name: Hierarchical Parent
parameter.help: The hierarchical parent activity, used to provide a default implementation for the 'Up' button
